data.title: A Main FRAG/MENT Wine Clear
data.description: Here's one way to successfully flush out any Defender Wine set up, as it'll damage and kill anyone staying within the molly.

data.title: Boat + Lane ZERO/POINT Line Up
data.description: Use this simple, but effective default ZERO/POINT line up to gain information on Defenders playing close to B Main. This is great in shutting down any aggressive set up.

data.title: Early Round B Main Default ZERO/POINT
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective ZERO/POINT line up you can use at the start of the round to gather information and contest B Main.

data.title: Mid Link to Mid FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: A good FLASH/DRIVE to blind enemies peeking mid. Especially useful against enemies peeking mid with an Operator.

data.title: A Lobby to A Main ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT to suppress enemies peeking A Lobby from A Main.

data.title: B Lobby to B Site FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for B Site from B Lobby to delay a defuse.

data.title: A Lobby to A Tree ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Tree from A Lobby to suppress your opponents.

data.title: B Lobby to B Boat House ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for B Boat House.

data.title: A Lobby to A Default FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for the default plant spot on A Site.
